website_summaries.verdict: A reasonably priced and versatile beverage dispenser that will last you for many years to come.
pros: Top doubles as a tray for food
cons: Dispenser is poorly placed, so you must tilt the unit to get the liquid left at the bottom

customer_reviews.title: Just bought my 3rd one
customer_reviews.text: These were better than expected. I have a very large family. I am the lucky one to have Christmas this year. I have about 50 people coming. These will be great for lemonade, Iced Tea , water or Sangria. Less waste of water bottles and soda cans left around the house lol! I love the little chalkboard for labeling them. Even comes with chalk. It has a cone center for ice. You can put fruit on top and even stack cups. I had no problem with any leaking. i did soak the nozzle in water before using.
customer_reviews.author: CatrineTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: This was great! It kept the beverages cold thanks to the ...
customer_reviews.text: This was great! It kept the beverages cold thanks to the reservoirs for ice and I love the area on top. I put different types of berries and lemons on it for guests to jazz up their tea or lemonade. Got many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I wanted to update my review and add a 4th star! This worked so great, kept the ice solid for hours, and I received so many compliments at my holiday party. I would definitely recommend. Mine came without chalk for the little sign and the space to put the sign cracked off. Spout easily goes on and doesn't leak so it's still usable. Disappointed because the sign was one of the selling points for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are SOOOO nice for the price! My 12 year old wanted to do a lemonade stand for a mission she wanted to support, and we needed a few drink dispensers to make it happen. These were great! Easy to assemble, use, and clean, and they store nicely too! These will get much more use in the future as we often host family dinners and gatherings throughout the year. I had a $45 dispenser prior to these, and it broke within the first few uses. You'll spend a fraction of the price on these and they do a better job and hold more fluid as well! Love!
customer_reviews.author: MNee

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Just received it and have to tell you it looks well made. The little spout part is little flimsy but overall it looks very nice. Also noticed that the 3 main parts for this item are made in USA. For that reason only I am all for it and for the price this will be awesome item to use this summer. Also had the measurements marked on the back side of it so you know how much you are mixing. Overall American made greatly priced piece our family will use this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Nele

customer_reviews.title: Use then toss.  It won't last.
customer_reviews.text: Ours leaked after one use. I tried a bunch of different things to get it to stop leaking, but it was from the spigot itself and not around the spigot.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Needed for a Party - You Failed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of this product to use for a party/baby shower. I received it the day before the party. I opened the first box and discovered that it was missing the spigot, chalk placard, and cap for the top of the dispenser. When I opened the second box, I found that it was also missing the same items. If I could give negative stars I would. This is unfortunate because I think that the product itself is reasonably priced and it looks good. To bad quality control in lacking in their shipping department.
customer_reviews.author: gregory r garcia

customer_reviews.title: No Spigot or Chalkboard
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with the spigot or the chalkboard. Useless. Thanksgiving is tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Steven L Boldt

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! It's amazing
customer_reviews.text: Arrived the day after I ordered it and it's amazing. I wish I got it sooner. You can't beat it for the price. The little chalk and tag is so cute. We will definitely be using this a lot over the summer. I just used it for rosé at my dogs birthday party. Do yourself a favor and buy one or two haha
customer_reviews.author: LISS GADALETA

customer_reviews.title: Big Disappointment..!!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this beverage dispenser thats why I ordered it and was waiting for it but it turned out a big disappointmnent. First thing - I got this late, delivery was not on time. Its really irritating when you are waiting for some stuff and its late than its given delivery date. Second - I was surprised to see it. It looks old & used. The lid on the top has a crack on it. The dispenser also has some marks on it as it has been used. The lid which has compartments on it,is yellowish on one side. Surprised to see such stuff from amazon. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tiwadi

customer_reviews.title: Pass on the tiny toxic plastic in my drinks.
customer_reviews.text: The cap eroded/broke down on my second week of use. I drank tea out of it regularly and though the small dark spots in my glass was tea/herbs... till I noticed some reflection on the dark spots. This is dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: GarbageMan

customer_reviews.title: Leaked from the sides
customer_reviews.text: Opened this and tested it with Water and there didn’t appear to be any leaks, but then when I used it for the first time it leaked out the sides :(
customer_reviews.author: ShopGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Beverage Dispensers!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these to use at my daughter's 21st birthday celebration. Put rum punch in one and sangria in the other. They hold a lot of liquid and were the perfect way to serve the beverages. Very easy to set up. The ice in the middle and bottom kept everything cool enough. The flow for the sangria dispenser did slow down when fruit got in the way. Just had to stir it a little and it worked fine again. They were easy to clean up afterward. For storage, the bottom stand and tags can fit inside so it takes up less room. I'll definitely be using these for other special occasions in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta L. Usilton

customer_reviews.title: Love this. We sold lemonade from it on a ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this. We sold lemonade from it on a summer day. It stayed cool thanks to the ice in the middle and at the bottom. I stuck a few cubes in with the water too.
customer_reviews.author: ohioonlineshopper

customer_reviews.title: Not for traveling, but great for at-home hosting.
customer_reviews.text: I really have no complaints with the unit outside of the spigot could be a little lower (to get the last bit out without tipping it). It works great, it's light - easy to assemble, clean and store away. Do understand though that if you're buying this, it's not going to work to make up something at home and take it with you. This is more for making in the kitchen and sitting on the table to serve, not make it at home and bring it to the picnic.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Vallon

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be fooled by packaging, but watch out for last few inches of beverage
customer_reviews.text: When I received this I was very nervous... The way it came package I was sure I was not going to like it. Found out, you can’t go by that... Take it out put it together and look at it, it worked and looked great! Have only used once, but did not have any issues with leaking or dripping... Both compartments for ice kept beverage more than cold enough. The only downside is that The nozzle is high up enough that you are left with quite a bit in the bottom that you cannot get out without Picking up and pouring into glass. Overall well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: JRS

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and you can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice and the price is certainly right (about $15). I like the way it can be packed back up in a relatively small box to keep until the next party with no problem and it looks very classy. Since the top removes and is a nice size to fit in a refrigerator, I could chill the punch overnight before the open house I used if for and then keep it cold with the ice in the bottom and the inner chamber without diluting the punch. The sign and the place to put the cups was an added bonus. Bravo!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the negative reviews deter you
customer_reviews.text: Mine had some of the black marks mentioned by other reviewers, but I didn't think it was that big of a deal. I also received only one size rubber gasket (two of the same size), but it didn't cause an issue with assembly. The beverage dispenser hasn't leaked, and has been handy for the family functions and birthdays I've hosted. I would definitely recommend this product (in fact I have two of them).
customer_reviews.author: Debbie B

customer_reviews.title: Best "party" purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: So easy to assemble, looks great set up! I bought two, one for spiked and one for regular. Looked so nice setup. Didn't leak, great that you could put the cups on top. The only thing that would make this even better is if the valve had a little net on the outside to keep it from getting blocked. My chopped fruit sangria got blocked so many times, that I finally just removed the lid and used a ladle to get it out. However, my 2nd one with just lemonade and strawberries were fine, because the strawberries floated, and didn't get caught in the valve.
customer_reviews.author: sarry abfalter

customer_reviews.title: Replacement unit works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for an event that I was hosting. When I took it out of the box, I immediately saw that the bottom piece, which serves as the base and ice holder, had a large crack in it. It wouldn’t have held ice without leaking. Disappointed, I returned it and had a replacement sent. To my surprise, the replacement showed up on the morning of the event. It was easy to install and the presentation was beautiful! Many people complimented it. There are two places that hold ice, while the lid holds cups and sliced fruit. The beverage stayed cold outside in the heat. I can’t wait to use it again! Make sure you inspect yours thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: SRS

customer_reviews.title: Both leaked. We tossed them at our event.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to serve sangria at my baby shower. Good price, poor product. One came cracked making it unusable. The other worked fine for 2 hours then started leaking. We emptied it, took off the spout and reassembled it. It worked for a few more minute after that then started leaking again. Luckily a family member stepped in to serve individual beverages so we didn’t need the pitchers. We ended up tossing both. A waste of $30 bucks.. not to mention they didn’t come with the chalked, as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: benenna melgoza

customer_reviews.title: A Party Staple
customer_reviews.text: Our old glass pitcher cracked in a move recently so we needed to purchase another pitcher for summer gatherings. I researched and found these. They’re sturdy plastic, so if taken care of and stored properly they’ll last you a long time. The design is awesome. We filled the top with fruit to add to tea and water and all our guests loved it. It’s also awesome you can stack a few cups on top as well. We’ve used these 4 times now this summer and highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Kinako Mochi

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic buy!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased several products of this type and they always end up having a fatal flaw when it comes to dispensing my black sangria at parties... I purchased this with low expectations due to the great price but it quickly prooved itself to be an amazing value. It's a great size, has a lid that allows an ice core, a nice sized stand that fits most party cups, is easy to take apart for washing, has a spout that doesn't clog easily, and even stores well. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: So Fain

customer_reviews.title: worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: these were easy to assemble and wipe them clean after putting together. they held very nicely when i filled them with liquid and didnt leak. they are large and hold a lot of liquid. only thing i would want changed is that there could be room for more ice in the middle section. i found myself filling that over and over again to keep the liquid cold because this was out on my counter due to lack of space in the fridge. nice product and cant wait to use for the next gathering
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly9

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties
customer_reviews.text: I bought this drink dispenser on a whim and I've loved it so far. It looks great and is very easy to use. It's decently easy to clean as well, but the one thing I dislike is the height of the spigot--you have to tip it when there's still quite a bit of liquid inside to get the last of it out. I also wish the very cute sign came with chalk or something! I have only used it when I've put a paper label over it. Beware of putting berries in your drink, last time I had a party I did this and they clogged the spigot, meaning my guests had to ladle their drinks out instead.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlionator

customer_reviews.title: Drinking in style!
customer_reviews.text: Brought three for a party and put battery operated string lights underneath. It was beautiful! I like this because I can serve healthier options like cucumber water and get away from soda and ugly soda bottles. Worked out well and no one missed that we didn’t have soda. I served iced tea, lemonade and cucumber mint water. The item also packs away nicely in the box it comes in. Storage is very easy and smaller than item when it’s assembled.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Must have for large parties.  It's a show stopper and attracts envy.
customer_reviews.text: I love this beverage dispenser. First I used it, guests complimented on it right away! It's very practical. Much better than the fancy glass beverage dispensers I always see. I love it that this has place to put your lemons or whatever fruits all around the top and cups in the middle top. So smart whomever designed this dispenser. Easy to put together and clean afterwards. I would recommend this to my families and close friends.
customer_reviews.author: Minami

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, great for parties!
customer_reviews.text: These were awesome. Bought 3 and used them for a pre-wedding barbecue for sangria and lemonade. Also used them at the Rehearsal dinner which was in a remote location with no refrigeration. The ice bucket underneath along with the ice sleeve that goes into the container part kept the wine cooler without diluting. Also loved the tray on top which we filled with various cut fresh fruits and garnishes. Very easy to assemble, did not leak...really have no negatives. If you're hesitating, don't, you will not be disappointed especially for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Carol  J

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy and doesn't have the problems the more expensive dispensers are plagued with.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting a lot for the price but I was very pleasantly surprised. This drink dispenser worked wonderfully and didn't leak at all around the spigot (which I read is a huge problem with other dispensers). The ice holders were excellent and kept our tea cold for hours while not diluting it with melted ice water. I was super happy with this beverage dispenser and will probably buy another one to offer a variety of drinks at our next gathering.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Britter

customer_reviews.title: Great Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy these dispensers are to put together and that upon tear down, everything fits inside the dispenser. The trays on top hold a good amount of fruit, and counter space is saved by holding cups on top. If I could change anything, it would only be to have the ice holder larger. We solved the problem by including ice inside the dispenser. These dispensers worked perfectly for a rehearsal dinner, and I am confident we’ll use them for bday, holiday parties, and much more. I definitely suggest purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: MistyA

customer_reviews.title: These made my party complete
customer_reviews.text: With 40 teenagers at a party, these were perfect! No spills of soda bottles or punch,. I bought 2, one for tea, one for punch. They didn't leak. The ice stayed cold for a long time, dispensing was easy for lots of kids. I could keep my eye from a distance on how fast I needed to refill. Great item for the price. I opened the day of the party at the venue. The one thing that would have helped was to have chalk included in the box for the black tags. I had to write on a piece of paper. If there was chalk, I would have given this a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect beverage dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I think people have problems with instructions because these thing hasn't given me any trouble at all. Every part is dishwasher safe (although the piece with the tap attached probably shouldn't be put in the DW). The little chalkboard is cute for labeling (I read a review where someone didn't like that it didn't come with chalk lol freaking amazing). It holds a good amount of liquid as well. Great for parties and cook outs! The top can hold cups or garnishes. I couldn't be happier with this.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size! It might be a little smaller than other products but for me, when I throw a party and fill these up with drinks it typically gets wasted and not used all the way. If I fill up the drink to the amount we would actually drink it looks funny that it’s not full all the way. This is the perfect size
customer_reviews.author: Megan S.

customer_reviews.title: Came with instructions on how to install the spigot but ...
customer_reviews.text: Came with instructions on how to install the spigot but did NOT come with the spigot. BEYOND upset, I needed this for an even tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 of these for serving cold beverages for a party and they kept cold on a 90 degree day for couple of hours with ice at the bottom and in the inset. Assembly was very easy. The only issue was we had a hard time opening the cover of the ice inset after the party when the ice had melted and created a vacuum seal. Will probably add a small piece of twine before closing next time to get a grip to open the lid.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Acrylic DIDN'T react with citric acid
customer_reviews.text: Have only used this twice so far, but it was easy to carry to my event, kept tea cold with internal ice storage, and-most importantly- the acrylic didn't react with the oranges in my tea. An earlier version purchased in a big box discount store a couple years back (and returned) completely scarred the acrylic as it dispensed tea. Lord knows what may have gone into the tea.I try not to think about it. With this one, same iced tea, same two oranges, cut in 1/8s, no reaction. Finally a good party beverage dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: pamsaunt

customer_reviews.title: A STEAL!!
customer_reviews.text: I brought 3 of these for a party! Ended up only using 2. These were easy to put together, and we used ice in the base and in the core, which kept the drinks cold without melting. I did add some assorted fruit on and utilized the cup holder on top. We also took a about a foot of 1 and a half inch ribbon and placed in the base for a decorative affect! These were definitely a great buy and I am so glad I purchased them!! I can't wait to use them again. Oh, mine didn't come with chalk for the mini boards.
customer_reviews.author: Bmo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Searched high and low for the perfect drink dispenser and had some missteps. This is the one. It's lightweight, SUPER easy to assemble and the spigot is perfect. I bought a drip tray just in case I needed it but I didn't need it at all. Not a single drip. Great value, clean look, good size. Love the cute little black label thingy that you can write on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: They have worked exactly as advertised. There are no leaks and it is nicely self contained on a window sill with a grow light. The only potential down side is that the plastic is thin, so do not know how many uses I will get out of them, but am on my second round with no issues. A few dents in the tray getting the seedlings out, but otherwise they do well. I like it much better than the "coffee pod" method.
customer_reviews.author: George N. Appenzeller

customer_reviews.title: Way better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I didn't expect much from a dispenser in this price range but it was easy to assemble, sturdy when ice and many ingredients were added, didn't leak, and was very easy to clean! I store it in the box it came in and it doesn't take up much space at all. I highly recommend this drink dispenser!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has a nice constant flow
customer_reviews.text: Just washed it in preparation for my Memorial Day bbq. I like the hanging label because I will be serving margaritas and lemonade and will be glad I won’t have to constantly explain which is which. I have owned many dispensers and have even purchased replacement spigots but they all trickled, so the best part for me is the ample flow, boy does it flow.
customer_reviews.author: KERRY F.

customer_reviews.title: Great party item
customer_reviews.text: I love the weight and compact size which make it so easy to store. I also appreciate the functionality of the top for cups. The one downside is the height and design of the spigot. There is a lot of liquid below the spigot so when you are busy with a party and you are keeping tabs on the drinks it doesn't look like it needs a refill when really much of the liquid is below the spigot access. The downside of the cups on top is if people start tipping the canister to get a refill then the cups have to be moved or they may fall over. Overall, great price for a useful and functional item.
customer_reviews.author: NW.mama

customer_reviews.title: Holds a LOT!
customer_reviews.text: ...I ordered two of these dispensers for my husband and daughter's combined birthday party (18th & 40th!), one for lemonade and one for an *ahem* adult beverage. It's sturdy, has a cup holder and the tray on the top came in handy for fruit that was used to enhance both beverages. Awesome investment. Definitely buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Beverage Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: These have been great water or tea dispensers at events. They hold up well, and do not seem prone to crack like acrylic. They are also BPA-free and I believe are made in the USA. The storage compartments in the lid are good for chilling tea without watering it down. The up-and-down spout is dispenses fast and without drips unlike the side-to-side spouts. Overall, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: LLM

customer_reviews.title: I like the size of it and I like that you ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my graduation party, I like the size of it and I like that you can write what the beverage is, it was easy to put together and I had no issue with the spout. However mine did not come with the chalk even the description says it was suppose to have one, I had to go to Michaels to buy chalk, that is the only reason I'm giving it 4 star.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: In love with this purchase. There's two places you can put ice to keep your beverage cold without watering it down. A tray underneath and a cone that dips into the middle. The top functions as a cup holder plus has a tray to put your drink garnishes. Easy to put together and clean. I will use it for every party I throw from here on out!
customer_reviews.author: Denae

customer_reviews.title: The spigot does not work
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed to find out that the spigot in this dispenser did not work at all after I had already made a beverage for a party. I was not expecting this product to be perfect or durable, but I feel that I should have been able to use it at least once! I am dissatisfied with this purchase and would not recommend it to others. I would invest in a better quality beverage dispenser, this was just a waste a money.
customer_reviews.author: Ivonnux

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous buying plastic beverage dispensers for my reception party, as they tend to look cheap and you can almost count on the fact that the spouts will leak/drip. I was wrong! Out of the box, they were in great condition, super easy to assemble and didn't leak/drip once during our party (5-6 hrs)! I had made more punch and sangria than I needed, so the issue other reviewers had about having to tilt their dispenser forward to get the last bit of beverage out wasn't an issue for me. I love these dispensers and I can't wait to use them again!
customer_reviews.author: lsmith81

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this multi-functional beverage dispenser. It is all in one - ice in the base and the center insert, top locks on and serves as a garnish and cup holder. The spigot was very easy to install and is liquid tight. The sign is cute; I recommend getting a chalk pen. I only ought one but a friend has two and they are stackable! I will likely buy another. Best part is it's easy to clean and it all nests so it has a small storage footprint.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Z

customer_reviews.title: Great beverage dispenser.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for kitchen counter. I assembled it on Christmas morning. Some other customers state that it leaks, and I chose to write a review because I took extra care to make the spigot very tight, giving it two more turns after I thought it was tight enough. It does not leak. It is attractive and has a compartment for ice.
customer_reviews.author: Carol70

customer_reviews.title: Washers and Nut Look Difficult from Assembly Instructions!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of this item. According to the assembly instructions, one THICK washer and one THIN washer are supposed to be included. But there are two of the SAME size washers. Also, the plastic nut looks different from the one in the assembly diagram. Please see the photos. I thought I should contact the seller, but another one has the same issue. So I assume the assembly diagram and instructions are not updated. I have just tested them with water. They work okay for a short time so far, no leaking. I’m hoping they are okay. Confusing.
customer_reviews.author: Kent's mom

customer_reviews.title: Party Party Party!
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for our 70’s themed tie dye black light party! Bought 3 of them to give a good variety of drinks and they worked better than expected for how affordable they were! They were easy enough to assemble that I didn’t have to ask my husband to help me (woo hoo!) I did have to get some chalk to use as it didn’t come with any. I got lots of compliments on them all night too! Overall I would highly recommend these and would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Kit Lavender

customer_reviews.title: The dispenser is very slow.
customer_reviews.text: You would think for the price the dispense would release liquid to flow well. But it dispenses soooo slow! My guest were all waiting in line and the water spits out like drops. Not worth the money. Cheap plastic overall anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size, easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly as described. One of the tops stuck on there a little too tight but once we were able to loosen it it was fine taking it off and on. It was nice not having to refill so often and even when I had to fill it up it was quick and no mess. I was able to wash them right away with hot soapy water ensuring to run water through the spout and rinse it very well. Once I put it away it looked as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: noel

customer_reviews.title: Great quality beverage dispenser at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for our wedding, and they were much better than I was expecting considering the price! They look really nice and were perfect for water and iced tea. I love that you can put ice in both the base and the part that goes down into the liquid, so it keeps everything nice and cold. They worked perfectly for the wedding and now we have them on hand for parties.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Best $15 you will spend for a party
customer_reviews.text: This Beverage Dispenser is such a well thought out product with many features that make so much sense. I bought two, and put water in one with slices of lemon and lime, while the other had a boozy punch. The hanging label is a bonus, along with the stackable feature. Seriously impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Allyn

customer_reviews.title: It got the job done without frustration.
customer_reviews.text: Used once for a baby shower I threw. It was easy to put together and to clean/ take apart to store back in box. I like that it has room for garnish like lemon or other fruits and you can store cups on top. I didn’t have any issues with leaking. I’ve needed a drink dispenser for a while and now I have one for future parties.
customer_reviews.author: boy mom

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price, missing one non-essential piece.
customer_reviews.text: Product came in a plain box, not a carton with photographs as referred to on the product instructions. Was missing chalk for beverage I.D. tag. However, it worked very well, was easy to assemble. Does not keep the beverage ice cold, but for fruit infused water it was just fine. Might not be cold enough for something like lemonade unless you put ice directly into the beverage. Overall I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: momsje3

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for Parties!
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased for my sons birthday party and was surprised at the quality. It kept the beverage cold, looked very nice, and the kids were able to use it with limited adult supervision. The added decorative piece of chalk board made it extra special as a ninja turtle party was complete with green lemonade "slime" easily shown the crystal clear dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: Merely A Mom

customer_reviews.title: I obviously got it mixed up with other beverage dispensers I was looking at but it was definitely not a disappointment and actually worked better because I didn't have any ...
customer_reviews.text: This held enough drink for my party guest of 20 to have 3 to 4 drinks. I used 6 Fl.Oz champagne flutes. My daughter printed the name of the signature drink and I taped it on the label holder. It was so cute. For some reason I thought the label holder was a small chalk board but its all plastic. I obviously got it mixed up with other beverage dispensers I was looking at but it was definitely not a disappointment and actually worked better because I didn't have any chalk anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great, but ice can melt fast
customer_reviews.text: Bought for an event where my friend was making some sort of white wine spritzer. Worked well but I didn't think it stayed super cool. Ice melted pretty quickly, but it was pretty hot at the outside event. Will use again as size is nice and spots for garnishes, etc is great.
customer_reviews.author: xxxxx

customer_reviews.title: Very scratched up
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this style, but unfortunately it arrived very scratched up and kind of gouged. I hoped it was a fluke until I opened the second one and it was in the same condition. I didn’t have time to order or find something different, so I still used them for my event and they worked well. I was just disappointed in the cosmetics of the containers.
customer_reviews.author: NC_SugarDumplin

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for a party and loaded with sangria and punch. The spout is kinda crappy, don't even think about using fruit inside of the container. I had berries plug the spout and had to empty it to clear it out. Overall they are good quality and they hold a lot of fluid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was awesome
customer_reviews.text: We bougth this for a baby shower. We made one with piña colada and one with lemanoade and they looked sooo good! We loved how pretty it looked and it worked perfectly. It is made from a ligth plastic material so just be careful not to drop it. I would deffenitly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price. Spout clogs very easily,
customer_reviews.text: Great dispenser for the price. The only thing is the spot is pretty narrow. I was going to use for watermelon margaritas at a party. The pulp from the watermelon immediately clogged the spout. Cleaned the spout and it clogged right away again. Sadly, I had to take the lid off and use as a punch bowl for the party. So unless you completely strain out any pulp the spot will not work at all. Would be perfect for tea, water or pulp free drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Solsticegirl

customer_reviews.title: Must have product
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to put together and was a huge hit at our housewarming get together. I especially loved the chalk board tag and the top where we put lemons, limes, and orange slices due the tea and our guests loved it. This is an awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: This is the best one out there!
customer_reviews.text: I researched so many beverage dispensers before I bought this and I'm so glad I went with this one. It works very well. Easy to clean, no spilling or leaking. Kept my beverage cold. The lid is so handy for storing sliced fruit. The cup holder is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Value for money dispenser
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these and was value for money. The lids have some imperfections with the locking mechanism but nothing too noticeable. It's not too big nor too small, perfect for a small gathering when you want to serve variety of drinks.
customer_reviews.author: St charms

customer_reviews.title: Nice and reliable
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Delivery was quick. Easy to assemble. They were a great addition to my sons party. Super easy to clean. Has a bowl at the bottom for ice to keep beverages cold as well as one in the middle of the top. Will use these for more parties/get togethers.
customer_reviews.author: Pretty Vee

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 2 but 2nd one leaked
customer_reviews.text: Was so impressed with first purchase, I ordered another. However, the 2nd dispenser leaked around spout/spigot. I had to place towel under it to catch leaking tea. I was given refund on 2nd order and I purchased stainless steel spigot to replace cheap one. So far, both containers are holding up well and I've used them dozens of times. Even my first order with cheaper spigot is still working great.
customer_reviews.author: JoLa

customer_reviews.title: Great for punch!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble, doesn’t leak and even had a hanging thing to put what the drink was. I used it for my birthday and it held a lot of liquids. Lasted awhile, the only thing is once the liquid level gets below the spout you’ll have to pour the liquid directly out of the container
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Bought it for my boyfriends pandemic themed birthday party and it was great I put Sangria in it (like sangre which is blood in Spanish) and it stayed cold the whole time
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Inouye

customer_reviews.title: Plastic spout is flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Like the design so u can put ice in it to keep cold without watering down the drinks. Easy to put together and take apart for cleaning. The lid on the top ice compartment can b difficult to take off if nothing is in it. The spout is plastic and could break easily if not careful.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly L.

customer_reviews.title: Loved this except had a few scratches
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product. The reason for the 4 stars is because I got my product a little scratched. I needed it right away so I couldn’t ask for an exchange. Buy this ahead of time just in case. But worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo anguiano

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Design
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I bought 2 of these dispensers for a party recently. They were easy to set up, use, clean and break down nicely for storage. They are so well designed, I love that I was able to fill the bottom and top with ice to keep the mixed drinks cold but not watered down once the ice began to melt. The top has fantastic dividers in it for garnishes such as lemons and limes.
customer_reviews.author: WrathofGrapes

customer_reviews.title: My laundry buddy
customer_reviews.text: This is a hugh asset to my laundry area. It comes in two parts which is detachable. I couldn't use the base because of the height on my shelf. It was extremely easy to assemble. Iam happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Stormy

customer_reviews.title: Great for punch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make a harvest cider punch and it worked so well! I had apples and oranges in there and they didn't get stuck like some have in the past. It's very light weight so it made traveling with it very easy, everything just sits inside of each other. There were no leaks out of it and it had liquid's held in for a very long time. Overall I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: BreanneZ

customer_reviews.title: It's the perfect size for a party of 20 - 30 guests
customer_reviews.text: This beverage dispenser is just what I was looking for. I will order another one soon and put it on top as advertised using one with lemonade and the other with ice tea. It's the perfect size for a party of 20 - 30 guests. I particularly love the top where you can put fruit like lemon wedges, strawberries or kiwi. It cleans quick and easy. I'm so glad I chose this dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl harris

customer_reviews.title: party
customer_reviews.text: I used this once for a summer party and it was awesome! holds a lot! I cant wait to use it again
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Beverage dispenser
customer_reviews.text: This beverage container is plastic but is just what I needed to keep my drink cold. The bottom has a seperate area to store the ice which never waters down your drink. Another nice feature is the dual purpose top. You can seve fruit or remove the tray and serve cups. I love the chalkboard label too. No more wondering what your drinking.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: The spigot was broken and did not work. We had to make do, since it was only discovered during the set up of the event.
customer_reviews.author: jkj

customer_reviews.title: Lasted two months
customer_reviews.text: Product lasted two months and then developed a scuff mark appearance on the inside. No longer look good and can't use in front of customers. Short lifespan. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: R. Barr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Party
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these and used them for a party. Only used them once, so I can't comment on durability, but they did the job. The ice pockets did a decent job at keeping the drinks cool, but ice still needed to be added to each cup. Glad I got these.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M

customer_reviews.title: After much research, happy I bought this one!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this twice now and I love it. I really appreciate that the drink stays cold for hours because you have the ice tube on the inside and ice below it. But no ice melt or dilution! I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: chrispita

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Compact
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! I am excited to use these---I ordered 3. Using for my mom's 90th birthday coming up. Easy to assemble. None of them were damaged in shipment; none leaked (tested as recommended as soon as rec'd); good flow of liquid from spigot. Shd store easily. Good weight to reservoir that holds liquid and the stand that could hold ice. VERY pleased all around!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Party Drink Container
customer_reviews.text: This party drink container was so perfect for our recent party. It’s high enough off the table you can put your cup under it. It’s easy to assemble and clean. The ice containers on the top and bottom keep your drink cold. And it comes with a nifty, cute little sign where you put a note saying what beverage is inside. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Whiteside

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product & great price
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my classroom during the warm weather. The kids love filling up their water bottles with the flavored water (cucumber/ berries/ lemon), and it helps keep everyone cool during the hot weather. Cleans up beautifully and is made very well. Will be taking it home during the summer months to use during backyard BBQ's. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size. I had other ones that were ridiculously big. I love that it has a place for fruit for a cocktail and a place to put ice to help keep the drink cool. It was very functional for my party. I look forward to continuing to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Del G

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Keeps beverages cold with two spaces for ice. I like that you can put fruit on the top along with cups. Purchased for my kids annual lemonade stand and it was perfect! I like that it isn’t glass and my kids could easily pour drinks. Will be used many times!
customer_reviews.author: stefanie jones

customer_reviews.title: Pitchers Up
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Bought two for a party and they were way better than expected. They come with tags and a removable ice container. Though the ice container is a bit small you can use the base as an ice holder too. The spouts were perfect too. Lots of opportunity to decorate. I stuck glitter spiders on them for a Halloween theme. Didn’t really put fruit in the sangria for fear of clogging spout. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: MissP

customer_reviews.title: No parts for assembly
customer_reviews.text: I will give it a one star because it arrived. I went to open it today because I ordered it for a baby m. However to my surprise I could no use it because the washers and nuts that’s described on the paper for the spout was not included. No there was no way to use it. Unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Kataria

customer_reviews.title: Well made, good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for my wedding in August, used 1 for lemonade with floating lemon slices then 1 for wine punch with a lot of berries floating in there- the dispensers flowed just fine and did not leak one bit at all. We used them again on Christmas Eve for unsweetened and sweetened tea and the tea stayed fresh in there for 2 days without refrigeration. Very good value, easy to take apart and clean, goes back together with no leaks!
customer_reviews.author: amy whittington

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very study and great quality. Thus is the best dispenser I have ever used. I bought 2. My kids even liked them. This is a great use for anywhere and easy set up
customer_reviews.author: fatgotti

customer_reviews.title: faulty item
customer_reviews.text: The third time I used this product they had to be discarded. I bought 4. Two completely stopped working. The liquid no longer comes out of the spout. Thats a positive because the other two black flakes come out of the spout. The inside of the spout is painted and the paint/plastic comes off and into the beverage it is dispensing. Do not buy this item.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Gagliardi

customer_reviews.title: Just get them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. We bought 3 to use side by side. They were easy to assemble if you follow the directions, and I had no leaking at all. I previously had glass ones, and these are easier to clean & lighter weight to carry. No worries about breaking them while toting them around. Happy to have found these at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks fancy, costs less- get this for your party
customer_reviews.text: This is the best party beverage dispenser ever! Easy to assemble and not that pricey! I bought two and filled both with water overnight to make sure there were no leaks- then used them for our annual Halloween kids lunch with “eyeballs” floating inside. The kids were able to use them easily and everyone loved how you can stack cups on top with garnishes too! Awesome, functional, cute!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: The silver paint inside the dispenser nozzle started flaking off. It was getting into the drinks. Weve had the product one month. One of the beverage holders have a crack along the top. We only hand wash with warm soapy water.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This was a super cool contraption, with the internal ice bowl, and the ice insert. The top held cups, garnish, and the spout worked great. Perfect for a huge batch of sangria!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the purchase. I bought two for my son's graduation party. Loved that you could put ice in the top and not water down the drink inside. Also love the space to put cups on top.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Douglas

customer_reviews.title: black flecks in plastic
customer_reviews.text: Cute, and as described, but there are thick, clearly visible black flecks throughout the inside of the plastic. They make it look dirty, even though it is washed, and will embarrass me if a guest spots them.
customer_reviews.author: Goldie

product_meta.title: Buddeez Party Top New Beverage Dispenser, 1.75 gallon, Clear
product_meta.description: Size:1.75 gallon| Color:ClearHosting a party? don't forget your Buddeez 1.75 gallon beverage Butler. The perfect assistant to any gathering. This dispenser really packs a punch - and can serve while you enjoy time with your guests. The 1.75 gallon unbreakable Tritan dispenser includes: ice cone to keep the beverage chilled but not dilute the deliciousness inside, garnish server/lid to hold Cups and multifarious beverage edibles including fruit and sweeteners, hang tag to identify contents and faucet for easy dispensing. These dispensers are stackable for more party fun and drink choices. The Buddeez beverage Butler also makes a great wedding or housewarming gift. Great for tailgating and picnics too! use with cold beverages only.
feature_bullets: Serve cold beverages with style at any occasion with a Tritan, BPA free Beverage server.
Features 1.75 gallon Beverage reservoir. party top, ice cone and hang tag.
Utilize the unique top for fruit and/or sweeteners and cups for ease of serving
Inner dimensions is 9 x 9 x 14.5 in inches. Handwashing recommended, Made in the USA
Stack two dispensers (sold separately) for a tower dispensing option.
Included Components: Beverage Dispenser Part listed on instruction page

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars3,542 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Beverage Dispenser Part listed on instruction page
